column4: hello, I have ubuntu 7.10 installed. I've recently installed kubuntu 8.10 on another partition. How do I add kubuntu to /boot/grub/menu.lst ? (When I installed Kubuntu I didn't choose to rewrite the boot so there's no Kubuntu in my grub menu when I turn on the computer.)
You'll need to edit that file.
, I know I have to edit that file but I don't know what lines to add for Kubuntu 8.10 , I don't know the kernel version and the rest
